dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.cbe.policy.fmk.PolicyAppliesToDetails
dataStructure.description:
This is an association class that explicitly defines which ManagedEntities in a PolicyDomain this Policy information applies to.This association defines the set of Policies that reside in a particular PolicyDomain. This single association links Policy and its subclasses to PolicyDomain. PolicyApplications are related to a PolicyDomain throught the ScopesPolicyApplication aggregation. Thus, different subclasses of PolicyApplication, such as PolicyServer, PDP, PEP, and PXP, can be placed in the same PolicyDomain as different Policies.

This association class is optional
dataStructure.label: PolicyAppliesToDetails

child.name: operatorAccess
child.description:
This attribute defines the access privileges that a user (human or otherwise) has when performing various operations on a ManagedEntity residing in a specific PolicyDomain.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: operatorAccess

child.name: resourceAccess
child.description:
This attribute defines the access privileges that the resource has. This may restrict the performance of operations that a user (human or otherwise) has access to when performing various operations on a ManagedEntity residing in a specific PolicyDomain.

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: resourceAccess
